casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Alonzo Antonio MURRELL 233PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 3, 2017 James W. Carter, Attorney at Law, G. Glenn Gerding, Attorney at Law, Daniel Lawrence Spiegel, Appellate Defender, for Murrell, Alonzo Antonio. Oliver G. Wheeler, Assistant Attorney General, Ernie Lee, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th of September 2017 by Defendant to Expedite Issuance of Mandate:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of October 2017."
